title: ID this?
content:
I’m in LOVE...could this be a font? anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_fullxfull_3780.97013915.jpg)
author: dolita

comments.content:
Reminds me of the custom lettering by people like [LoveJenna](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193846/http:/lovejenna.blogspot.com/).

Try searching for “scrapbook” or “whimsy” at myfonts for possible options.

Also found the site of [Crystal Kluge](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193846/http:/www.crystalkluge.com/crystalkluge/crystal_kluge_lettering_%26_illustration.html) who does lettering similar to this.

She’s also done some type design under the name ’Tart Workshop’ and you may be interested in [Nelly Script Flourish](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026193846/http:/www.tartworkshop.com/Site/nelly_script_flourish.html)
